objects.description: [PlugX](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0013) can be added as a service to establish persistence. [PlugX](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0013) also has a module to change service configurations as well as start, control, and delete services.(Citation: CIRCL PlugX March 2013)(Citation: Lastline PlugX Analysis)(Citation: PWC Cloud Hopper Technical Annex April 2017)(Citation: FireEye APT10 April 2017)(Citation: Proofpoint ZeroT Feb 2017)
